name: LEXenstein
body:
### Introduction
LEXenstein is a framework for Lexical Simplification. It has several modules that allow for the user to create entire simplification systems.

### Installation
To learn how to install and use LEXenstein, please read the [PDF manual](https://github.com/ghpaetzold/LEXenstein/raw/master/manual/LEXenstein%20Manual.pdf).

### Documentation
To access LEXenstein's API, please visit the [online documentation page](http://ghpaetzold.github.io/lexenstein/documentation/).

### Support
If you have any problems or questions about the toolkit, simply report it in the issues section of the project's Github page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
